si.title: பங்களாதேஷில் பாடசாலை மீது விமானம் விழுந்து விபத்து ; ஒருவர் பலி, பலர் காயம் !
body_lines: බංග්ලාදේශයේ අගනුවර වන ඩකාහි පාසලක පාසලක් කඩා වැටීමෙන් එක් අයෙකු මියගොස් 13 දෙනෙකු තුවාල ලබා තිබේ.
F-7 BGI ට මිනිත්තු 25 කට පසුව එෆ් -7 බී.ජී.අයි.
மதிய உணவு இடைவேளையின் போதே விமானம் பாடசாலை  உணவகத்தின் கூரை மீது  விழுந்துள்ளது. සිද්ධිය අතරතුර එහි සිසුන් බොහෝ දෙනෙක් එහි සිටියහ.

en.title: A plane crash on school in Bangladesh; One kills, many hurt!
body_lines: One person was killed and 13 people were injured when a plane crashed into a school in a school in Bangladesh's capital Dhaka.

The Inter-Service Public Relations Directorate (ISPR) said that the F-7 BGI's Chinese production flight departed from Uttara's Diabari region in the northern part of the capital, Diabari, about 25 minutes after the F-7 BGI.
The airplane fell on the roof of the school restaurant during lunch break. There were many students there during the incident.
